scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:ts:frontend && npm run build:scss
scripts.build:ts:frontend: tsc public/index.ts --outDir public/dist --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck && tsc public/login/login.ts --outDir public/login/dist --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck && tsc public/register/register.ts --outDir public/register/dist --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck && tsc public/Game/game.ts --outDir public/Game/dist --target ES2020 --lib ES2020,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:scss: sass public/style.scss public/dist/style.css && sass public/login/login.scss public/login/dist/login.css && sass public/register/register.scss public/register/dist/register.css && sass public/Game/game.scss public/Game/dist/game.css
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:frontend
